duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in planning, developing, and executing technical documentation, including drawings and specifications for building permits and construction.
Coordinate production of schematic, design development, and construction documents in collaboration with the Project Manager and/or Senior Project Architect.
Conduct field measures, take photos of existing conditions, and evaluate the feasibility of proposed design intentions against existing conditions.
Use software to design, sketch, and provide drawings of proposed projects, as well as resolve complex technical and design issues with the team.
Prepare 2D and 3D presentation/design drawings and build models for client/project team review.
Review drawings supplied by vendors, clients, and other discipline group designers that affect the specific project design.
Oversee design and construction activities, studies, and various analyses, leading design coordination across architecture and engineering disciplines.
